Ristretto.name: Ristretto
Ristretto.description: Very concentrated and thus especially aromatic espresso.

Espresso.name: Espresso
Espresso.description: The classic: small, strong coffee with hazel crema.

Espresso Doppio.name: Espresso Doppio
Espresso Doppio.description: Coffee Beverage with double filling compared to default espresso.

Coffee.name: Coffee
Coffee.description: Large cup of coffee, brewed using espresso as the base.

EspressoMacchiato.name: Espresso Macchiato
EspressoMacchiato.description: Espresso with some milk froth; Italian for 'stained espresso'

Cappuccino.name: Cappuccino
Cappuccino.description: One third of each espresso, warm milk and milk froth

LatteMacchiato.name: Latte Macchiato
LatteMacchiato.description: Specialty with three layers, served in a glass: warm milk at the bottom, espresso in the middle, milk froth on top

CaffeLatte.name: Caffe Latte
CaffeLatte.description: Half coffee, half warm milk; typically served in a bowl

MilkFroth.name: MilkFroth
MilkFroth.description: Frothed milk, e.g. for hot chocolate

KleinerBrauner.name: Kleiner Brauner
KleinerBrauner.description: Austrian coffee speciality: Single espresso with a dash of warm milk

GrosserBrauner.name: Grosser Brauner
GrosserBrauner.description: Austrian coffee speciality: Double espresso with a dash of warm milk

Verlaengerter.name: Verlaengerter
Verlaengerter.description: Austrian coffee speciality: Espresso diluted ("verlängert") with the same quantity of hot water

VerlaengerterBraun.name: Verlaengerter Braun
VerlaengerterBraun.description: Austrian coffee speciality: Verlängerter with a dash of warm milk

WienerMelange.name: Wiener Melange
WienerMelange.description: Austrian coffee speciality: Half espresso, half milk froth; stronger than a cappuccino

FlatWhite.name: Flat White
FlatWhite.description: Espresso topped with a specific style of silky frothed milk

Cortado.name: Cortado
Cortado.description: Colombian coffee speciality: Ristretto diluted with the same quantity of warm milk

CafeCortado.name: Cafe Cortado
CafeCortado.description: Spanish coffee speciality: Espresso with a dash of warm milk; Spanish for 'cut coffee'

CafeConLeche.name: Cafe ConLeche
CafeConLeche.description: Spanish coffee speciality: Half coffee, half milk froth; with a brown milk froth on top

CafeAuLait.name: Cafe Au Lait
CafeAuLait.description: French coffee speciality: Caffe latte with a high share of coffee; typically served for breakfast

Doppio.name: Doppio
Doppio.description: Italian coffee speciality: Double espresso; prepared with the double amount of ground coffee

Kaapi.name: Kaapi
Kaapi.description: South Indian coffee speciality: Hot milk with two teaspoons of very intense coffee; typically sweetened

KoffieVerkeerd.name: Koffie Verkeerd
KoffieVerkeerd.description: Dutch coffee speciality: Mild caffe latte with more warm milk than coffee; inverted ("verkeerd"), as caffe latte usually has more coffee than milk

Galao.name: Galao
Galao.description: Portuguese coffee speciality: Very mild caffe latte; typically served in a glass

Garoto.name: Garoto
Garoto.description: Portuguese coffee speciality: Half milk froth, half espresso; also referred to as '"children's coffee"

Americano.name: Americano
Americano.description: American coffee speciality: espresso diluted with two parts of hot water; easier to drink than a classic filter coffee

RedEye.name: Red Eye
RedEye.description: American coffee speciality: Coffee plus one espresso; a great wake up call after a late night

BlackEye.name: Black Eye
BlackEye.description: American coffee speciality: Coffee plus two espressos for an extra kick caffeine

DeadEye.name: Dead Eye
DeadEye.description: American coffee speciality: coffee with three espressos; for the ultimate caffeine kick.

Quick45.name: Snel 45
Quick45.description: Snel programma voor licht vieze vaat

Intensiv70.name: Intensiv70
Intensiv70.description: Speciaal programma voor vieze vaat, zoals potten en pannen

Normal65.name: Normal65
Normal65.description: Programma voor zowel normale als vieze vaat

Quick65.name: Quick65
Quick65.description: Snel programma voor licht vieze vaat

AutoHalfLoad.name: AutoHalfLoad
AutoHalfLoad.description: Programma voor een halfvolle machine. Verbruikt minder water

IntensivPower.name: IntensivPower
IntensivPower.description: Voor zeer vieze vaat, potten en pannen

MagicDaily.name: MagicDaily
MagicDaily.description: Kort en intensief programma voor dagelijks gebruik

ExpressSparkle65.name: ExpressSparkle65
ExpressSparkle65.description: Voor zeer vieze vaat, potten en pannen

MachineCare.name: Machine reiniging
MachineCare.description: Gebruik met machinereiniger en zonder vaat

MaximumCleaning.name: Maximale reiniging
MaximumCleaning.description: Voor zeer vieze vaat, potten en pannen
